quotes.quote: All values in this world are more or less questionable, but the most important thing in life is human kindness.
Whatever we think about and question a lot becomes questionable.
It is questionable if all the mechanical inventions yet made have lightened the day's toil of any human being.
One must shy away from questionable undertakings, even when they bear a high-sounding name.
The world has always been uncertain. This is the nature of the world.
Controversial' as we all know, is often a euphemism for 'interesting and intelligent.
If you're not controversial, you'll never break through the din of all the commentary.
Controversial means somebody who makes people think. And if you are afraid of people who will be against you, you might as well stay home and do nothing.
Having a relationship with people of questionable character is like playing with a razor blade on your skin, and pretending to observe that it is harmful to your body.
Natural talent is a questionable phenomenon. Inclination perhaps, but innate ability is extremely rare.
When the next step is unclear, the best way to figure it out is to take action. Constant motion is the key to execution.
We doubt that any facts actually exist. We only have observations and interpretations. Most of the interpretations remain questionable.
The least questioned assumptions are often the most questionable.
It is important to have questionable friends you can trust unconditionally.
The planet will survive. Whether we get to be here and enjoy it, or enjoy life as we've known it, is what's questionable.
Verbosity leads to unclear, inarticulate things.
It's not controversial to say that human activity is contributing in some way. The question is how serious that is.
It's better to be controversial for the right reasons, than to be popular for the wrong reasons.
Controversial proposals, once accepted, soon become hallowed.
